verses.verse: How long will you forget <WH7911> me <WH3068>, O Lord? for ever <WH5331>? how long will you hide <WH5641> your face from me <WH6440>?
How long shall I take <WH7896> counsel <WH6098> in my soul <WH5315>, having sorrow <WH3015> in my heart <WH3824> daily <WH3119>? how long shall my enemy <WH341> be exalted over me <WH7311>?
Consider <WH5027> and hear <WH6030> me <WH3068>, O Lord my God <WH430>: lighten <WH215> my eyes <WH5869>, lest I sleep <WH3462> the sleep of death <WH4194>;
Lest my enemy <WH341> say <WH559>, I have prevailed <WH3201> against him <WH6862>; and those that trouble me rejoice <WH1523> when I am moved <WH4131>.
But I have trusted <WH982> in your mercy <WH2617>; my heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH1523> in your salvation <WH3444>.
I will sing <WH7891> unto the Lord <WH3068>, because he has dealt bountifully with me <WH1580>.
